column4: Hey guys, how do I mount my ext3 hard drive from the Live CD? so I can mess with it?
So who knows how to mount my hard drive from teh Live CD?
Thanks apokryphos
also, does anyone know what the difference between Apt-Get and Aptitude is on the command line?
aptitude has a interface, and it also installs recommended packages.
So the only difference on teh command line is dependency handling
yes, but typing "sudo aptitude" brings you to a UI of sorts, while apt has no such interactive interface.
you tried "gimpshop"
I haven't tried it yet, actually
how seriously do you use photoshop? if you dont require cymk and shit and you dont want to buy pixel, use gimp or gimpshop
or buy pixel, itz pretty awesome - http://www.kanzelsberger.com/pixel/?page_id=12
I have over six years of Photoshop experience.  It's second nature to me.  I almost literally can't use GIMP.
I'm a graphic designer, and I don't have six years to re-learn GIMP.
gimpshop hacks the gimp UI to make it identical to PS
Does it really have the same functionality?
Because if it does, I'd be happy to try it out.  But I really do NEED Photoshop.
What is Pixel, exactly...?
like a cheap PS alternative, basically the same functionality, runs on anything, and only costs 25 dollars or so.
check i t out here - http://www.kanzelsberger.com/pixel/?page_id=12 - i need photo manip enough to justify buying it.
I'll check it out.  I think I'm going to have to end up dual booting, though.
if you REALLY need cs2 features etc. then yes dual boot or virtual machine is your only way really.
I'm interested in VMing.  I haven't been able to find a cogent tutorial anywhere, though.  Is it a wise choice, or is it too slow?
don't know, ive never done it personallu.
